response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We kindly propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer not only ensures a significant return on our investment but also provides you with an exceptional value that aligns perfectly with your expectations and needs. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially welcoming you as a valued client.", "product_price": 950000}
